column5: Hello everyone,  Just wanted to take the time to introduce myself. I am a 38 year old Noobie to fishing. I started fishing again late last year for the first time in over 20 some odd years. The one thing I have discovered it that fishing is SO relaxing. I am slowing finding places to shore fish, bu I usually go to Kars Ont. on the old pier. All last year all my son and I managed to catch are small perch, and 1 really small small mouth bass from the Lock on Prince of wales drive. in Ottawa.  So if you have great tips you want to share please feel free to send a quick message. May this yar be better for us fishing.  Roy
Welcome aboard Roy!!! Quite a few lads down around the Valley that you may be able to hook up with !!!
Welcome back to fishing! Hope to see some PB's from you this year

Welcome to the board!!!My Bro is in Metcalfe, so i know the area well.Fishing is good all throughout that area. I fish out of Morrisburg often.Go west into Kanata/Shirleys bay area.There are places all down there where you can get in to fish.   Paul
welcome aboard....  we love pics... even of the small fish.... it's the adventure that keeps us interested most of the time anyway

Welcome aboard Roy as the others have said we have a big group in the Ottawa area. Hope you and your son get into some good fish this year. The carp show is in a few weeks up your way that would be a good place to start looking for fishing info.
